name: Saturn Systems Software Engineering
description:
Saturn Systems is a software engineering firm that combines highly skilled software engineers with a lower cost model to deliver custom software solutions. Saturn Systems helped pioneer the alternative to offshore software development called Rural Outsourcing. Located in the mid-sized town of Duluth, Minnesota, Saturn Systems offers highly skilled domestic software developers at significantly reduced costs in comparison to metro area firms.
Strong technical expertise, a stable workforce and lower costs make Saturn Systems the ideal outsourcing partner.
